CustomField.formula: IF ( INCLUDES ( Related_SCA__r.Requested_Days_of_Week__c , "Monday" ), "Monday; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Related_SCA__r.Requested_Days_of_Week__c , "Tuesday" ), "Tuesday; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Related_SCA__r.Requested_Days_of_Week__c , "Wednesday" ), "Wednesday; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Related_SCA__r.Requested_Days_of_Week__c , "Thursday" ), "Thursday; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Related_SCA__r.Requested_Days_of_Week__c , "Friday" ), "Friday; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Related_SCA__r.Requested_Days_of_Week__c , "Saturday" ), "Saturday; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Related_SCA__r.Requested_Days_of_Week__c , "Sunday" ), "Sunday; ",null )
CustomField.label: Related SCA Requested Days of Week
